About

I am currently a Product Manager and Research Lead at Airflip, a vendor intelligence platform for enterprise procurement teams. As the first hire, I launched our intial product, leading the development of our vendor research, deal management workflows, and AI-driven spend analytics.

Previously, I was as an Optimization Specialist at Blackrock working on their Aladdin risk and trading platform. I was responsible for delivering new optimization use cases, resolving issues for 10+ enterprise clients, and driving optimization adoption for portfolio construction and risk management tools.

I graduated from UC Berkeley with a BA in Data Science (Cognition and AI emphasis) in 2019. While in school, I worked for the Division of Data Science, where I led a marketing team to promote the launch of the new data science major. I was also the Chief Marketing Officer for ML@B, Berkeleyâ€™s machine learning club, where I created strategic content showcasing the academic and industry applications of machine learning.
